content.question: The most significant difference in the way writing is used to convey meaning in Xu Bing’s A Book from the Sky and Shirin Neshat’s Rebellious Silence from the Women of Allah series is that

choices.label: Xu repeats a message many times while Neshat includes a single text
Xu’s work is made with block-printed characters while Neshat’s text is written in ink
Xu’s work employs invented characters while Neshat’s work quotes from a poem
Xu does not use text for social commentary while Neshat does

content.answer: Xu’s work employs invented characters while Neshat’s work quotes from a poem

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
